alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Northern Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 6:50PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Horry County through 715 PM EDT... At 650 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Goretown, or 17 miles northwest of Little River, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Loris, Goretown, Allsbrook, and Loris Community Hospital. This includes SC Highway 22 between mile markers 13 and 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
